title: 求帮助打指令
author: 笔墨-僮午
txt_content:
本人制作地图需要一些指令，但本人不会……求帮忙
1.一个百分百分掉落一个粘液球的普通僵尸
2.一个移动速度比平常快的手拿石剑的普通骷髅
3.同1，不过要穿上皮革一套
就这些

replies.author: lichi2050
replies.txt_content:
1.普通僵尸
/summon Zombie ~ ~1 ~ {Equipment:[{id:"minecraft:slime_ball",Count:1},{},{},{},{}],DropChances:[2F,0F,0F,0F,0F]}复制代码
2.骷髅
/summon Skeleton ~ ~1 ~ {Attributes:[{Name:"generic.movementSpeed",Base:1f}],Equipment:[{id:"minecraft:stone_sword"},{},{},{},{}]}复制代码
3.还是骷髅
/summon Skeleton ~ ~1 ~ {Attributes:[{Name:"generic.movementSpeed",Base:1f}],Equipment:[{id:"minecraft:stone_sword"},{id:"minecraft:leather_boots"},{id:"minecraft:leather_leggings"},{id:"minecraft:leather_chestplate"},{id:"minecraft:leather_helmet"}]}复制代码
